Articles.Content:
Hey guys! I\'m a new aircraft builder here at KSP. Trying to perfect my VTOL engineering. I was first attracted to the site through the aircraft exchange. I will be posting some of my own later on. I know someone here built a Hornet VTOL, but it was for 0.15, I made a copy with a few changes for 0.16. These aircrafts are easy enough to make, but took forever to tweek just right.

The new Hornet.

My jumbo VTOL 'Chinook'. lol

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
